description: Those who can be counted on to do the right thing as expected by society.
Those who act in accordance with law, tradition, or personal codes.
Those who methodically take what they want, within the limits of a code of tradition, loyalty, or order.
Those who do the best they can to help others according to their needs.
Those who who prefer to steer clear of moral questions and don't take sides.
Those who do whatever they can get away with, without compassion or qualms.
Those who act as their conscience directs, with little regard for what others expect.
Those who follow their whims, holding their personal freedom above all else.
Those who act with arbitrary violence, spurred by their greed, hatred, or bloodlust.
